content: click here for free pattern tutorial ** paw print bag charm tutorial 1 ** we re crafting something easy practical and adorable to boot if you re a beginner searching for an easy pattern a fan of crochet bagcharms and pouches or simply love doggy paw prints this tutorial is perfect for you what do you think of a cute paw print bag charms that can also be a mini coin pouch join us as we guide you through the entire process of making a paw print bag charm from start to finish with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll have your own paw print pouch in no time whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out you ll find this paw print pouch tutorial project both enjoyable and rewarding you will need * yarn - in 2 colors of your choice * crochet hook * stitch markers i use weight 4 yarn for this project and a 3mm hook if you want your pw print pouch to be the same size as mine use any yarn that can fit well on a 3mm/no 5 hook in this tutorial you ll learn * how to crochet a paw print bagcharm/coin pouch * step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals ✨ why you ll love this tutorial * clear easy-to-follow instructions * high-quality close-up visuals to guide you through each step * a simple project that takes a short time to finish * a fun and rewarding project that would make a great gift 1 https //youtu be/y_vwfsovsb0
